GET /providersÂ¶

In each GET API request, you have to include the `Api-Version` header

{'Api-Version':2}

List of all supported providers

Example request:

GET /providers
Host: mist.io
Accept: application/json; charset=UTF-8

Example response:

{'supported_providers':
[
  {'provider': 'bare_metal',
   'regions': [],
   'title': 'Other Server'},
  {'provider': 'azure', 'regions': [], 'title': 'Azure'},
